Donald Rumsfeld takes direct aim at Colin Powell in recounting the former general's famous U.N. speech in February 2003, laying out the administration's case that Saddam Hussein indeed possessed a stockpile of banned weapons. Over time a narrative developed that Colin Powell was somehow innocently misled into making a false declaration to the Security Council and the world, Donald Rumsfeld writes. Few of Michael Vick 's supporters have been as staunchly behind Reid. "He had a plan and he stuck to that, both on and off the field," Reid said. A star in Atlanta for most of his six seasons as a Falcon after being selected first overall in the 2001 draft, Michael Vick missed 2007 and 2008 while incarcerated for 18 months in a federal prison.
